name: The Amazing Digital Funkin'
summary: The Amazing Digital Funkin' is a parody Friday Night Funkin' mod based around The Amazing Digital Circus. In the mod, Boyfriend goes against Pomni and Jax.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Friday Night Funkin' VS Pomni & Jax | The Amazing Digital Circus / FUNKIN (Digitalizing) (FNF Mod)
